revised_title: Comparison of Magnetic Instruments at Kew Observatory
tldr: The author describes a comparison of magnetic instruments at Kew Observatory with those from Parc Saint-Maur Observatory, conducted by M. T. Moureaux. The comparison serves to connect the standard instruments at Kew Observatory with the standard French instruments at Parc Saint-Maur, establishing a connection between the two observatories' magnetic surveys.
